title: Rex's Dino Store: Visit the subway newsstand that's a real fossil
description: Welcome to Rex's Dino Store, a public art exhibit that's part of the MTA's Vacant Unit Activation program.

title: Not just 'eunuchs' or sex workers: In ancient Mesopotamia, gender-diverse people held positions of power
description: Today, trans people face politicization of their lives and vilification from politicians, media and parts of broader society.

title: Bringing back Scotland's ancient pine forests
description: Conservationists are working to restore the Caledonian pine forest to boost the country's bio-diversity.

title: Bringing back Scotland's ancient pine forests
description: Conservationists are working to restore the Caledonian pine forest to boost the country's bio-diversity.

title: Surface ceramics reveal self-sufficient rural economy in Ancient Samos
description: An international team of researchers has uncovered hidden clues about life in the hills of ancient southwest Samos, Greece.
